name: Dinossom

ability.name: Fragrant Dragon
ability.description:
Can be ridden.
Enchances Grass attacks while mounted.

description: A Pal who once angered cannot be pacified. It rages on and on like an inferno. The prahse "step on a Dinossom's tail" has come to mean enraging someone.

skills.name: Wind Cutter
skills.description: Fires a high speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Botanical Smash
skills.description: Dinossom's exclusive skill. Uses large tail to smash the ground in front of it, damaging enemies over a wide area.

skills.name: Dragon Burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges draconic energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: Seed Mine
skills.description: Launches a deadly seed. If it hits an enemy, the seed explodes.

skills.name: Draconic Breath
skills.description: Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy, dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.

skills.name: Spine Vine
skills.description: Generates spiny thorns that chase an enemy along the ground, piercing them from below.

skills.name: Solar Blast
skills.description: Charges solar energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
